price: 7. Y quienes busquen (tener relaciones íntimas con) otras mujeres serán unos transgresores.
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: famani ib'taghā warāa dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ʿādūna
